pages.text: Before you cook!$(br2)You have to do different steps.$(br2)Follow this Guide to learn the basics that lead you to a master chef.

pages.title: Step 1
pages.text: Craft a Knife!$(br2)Knifes are helpful for:$(br)$(li)Secondary Animal Drops$(li)Yield Straw$(li)Melee Weaon$(li)Cutting$(li)Portioning Ingredients

pages.title: Step 2
pages.text: Gather Ingredients$(br2)Harvest wild Crops with a knife or otherwise.$(br2)Harvest Animals with a Knife or otherwise.$(br2)Read more about $(l:patchouli:farming/plants_entry)Wild Crops$(/l).

pages.title: Step 3
pages.text: Craft a Cooking Pot and place it above a heat source:$(br)$(li)Campfire$(li)Open Flames$(li)Lava$(li)Stove

pages.title: Cooking Infos
pages.text: Start to fill up the 6 Slots with Food Items.$(br2)If you break the Cooking Pot, the Food stays. So you can carry your dishes around.$(br2)Most Meals need a container to be served on, such as Bowls.
Just in case you don't know the Stove Recipe.
You can chop down most meat and other ingredients to recieve smaller portions.$(br2)Use your Knife.
Cook on the fly with the Skillet.$(br2)Just stay near a heat source and hold the ingredient in your offhand.

pages.title: More Infos
pages.text: Check the Advancements by pressing L on your keyboard.$(br2)Hop over to Farmer's Delight Tab.$(br2)Read the Advancements and go from there.
